Posted By: Hoonster (3/5/2011 10:33:39 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: I had a pet badger once, when I worked as a producer in a recording studio back in the 60's. His name was Mel; he'd always rock out when the Box Tops came in to record, he'd bob his head side to side. Turns out that the noise was actually giving him seizures, poor thing, died horribly one session. We replaced him with a \*\*\*atiel. If you ever listen real close to "Choo Choo Train" you can make out the chirping at the :55-60 mark. True story.
posts.html:
